mdRecord.dcterms:title: The reports of Sir Edward Coke, Knt. in English, in thirteen parts complete, with references to all the ancient and modern books of law, exactly translated and compared with the First and last edition in French, and printed page by page with the same. [1572-1616] to which are now added, the restrictive pleadings, in English / The whole newly revised, and carefully corrected and translated, with many additional notes and references, by George Wilson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Coke, Edward Sir, 1552-1634
Great Britain. Court of King's Bench.
Great Britain. Courts.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for W. Owen, G. Kearsley [et al.
